jobDescription: Title: Data Analyst – CFR MetricsLocation: Redmond, WADuration: 12-18 MonthsRequired SkillsMust have hands on experience in Cosmos and ScopeMust have experience in SQL and handling large amount of dataMust have Experience with Excel, Power PivotSomebody who is comfortable generating ideas and not just takes ordersMust have past Cloud experienceExperience with building dashboards in PowerBI is PreferredExperience with predictive analytics is Preferred.
